QuestData.Title: Altered Beasts
QuestData.Description: We, the blue dragons, have been forced out of our home, Mazthoril. An impostor by the name of Umbranse has taken advantage of us in our weakest hour, and now occupies the cave.$b$bMazthoril is a place of extremely potent magic, and he does not know how to wield it. Even the wildlife suffers.$b$bThe beasts nearby have been altered. Please, $r, I must ask you a favor. Gather their brains, so I can see if I can undo this Umbranse's wild magic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 5 Mana-Addled Brains from Altered Beasts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Mazthoril belongs to the blue dragonflight. This is not right.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's see what I can do with these...
